children.text: Founded in 1865, the San Antonio Express-News is a large daily newspaper in San Antonio, Texas.

mainImage.alt: Complaining that environmental regulations are "burdensome," corporations ignore the trillions of dollars of benefits they produce.
mainImage.caption: Complaining that environmental regulations are "burdensome," corporations ignore the trillions of dollars of benefits they produce.

node.title: Don't listen to corporations. Environmental regulations are worth it.

children.text: The cost to corporations complying with environmental regulations is a fraction of the trillions of dollars of benefits — and cleaner air and water — regulations produce.

node.Action1Title: Share this story on the social media with the hashtag #OurSharedHou
